These projects bring together my experience in **business analytics, AI in operations, and account management**.

<div class="projects-grid">

<div class="project-card">
  <div class="project-badge">Academic · AI & Supply Chain</div>
  <h3>AI in Supply Chain Evaluation (BUSI 654)</h3>
  <p class="project-meta">
    <strong>Role:</strong> Lead Analyst & Author • <strong>Year:</strong> 2025
  </p>
  <p>
    Evaluated four large language models—<strong>GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, and LLaMA</strong>—
    on ten advanced questions in operations and supply chain management. Topics included
    demand forecasting in volatile markets, bullwhip mitigation, supplier risk, blockchain
    transparency, and ethical participation of Indigenous suppliers.
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li>Designed a structured <strong>evaluation rubric</strong> (accuracy, clarity, ethical sensitivity, business value).</li>
    <li>Built an <strong>Excel analysis dashboard</strong> with bar and radar charts comparing LLMs to human answers.</li>
    <li>Identified each model’s <strong>strengths, biases, and blind spots</strong> in real business decision scenarios.</li>
    <li>Produced a full academic report with <strong>APA citations</strong> and an appendix of LLM drafts and human edits.</li>
  </ul>
  <p class="project-tags">
    <span class="tag">LLM Evaluation</span>
    <span class="tag">Supply Chain</span>
    <span class="tag">Ethics</span>
    <span class="tag">Excel Analytics</span>
  </p>
</div>
